mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( RV_NUM, RV_TITLE, RV_BODY, RV_HIT, MB_CODE, RV_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_RV_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{RV_TITLE}, #{RV_BODY}, 0, #{MB_CODE}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RV_HIT = NVL(RV_HIT, 0) + 1 WHERE RV_NUM = #{RV_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT A.RV_NUM, A.RV_HIT, B.MB_ID, TO_CHAR(A.RV_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MM') AS RV_DATE, A.RV_TITLE, A.RV_BODY, A.MB_CODE FROM REVIEW A, MEMBER B WHERE A.MB_CODE = B.MB_CODE AND A.RV_NUM = #{RV_NUM}
SELECT MB_INITIAL, MB_TARGET, MB_LOWEST, PD_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MB_CODE = #{MB_CODE}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RV_TITLE = #{RV_TITLE}, RV_BODY = #{RV_BODY}, RV_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE RV_NUM = #{RV_NUM}
